attributes.action: Put a stop to the mandatory BT Payment Processing Fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How can BT charge the consumer for the privilige of making payment to them?

Why should we have to pay for the right to make our BT payment by cheque or cash?

Why should we be forced into setting up a direct debit to pay our bill?

We, the consumers, deserve to be able to make a free choice about the method we use to make payment without financial blackmail.
